caption.p: Randomisation scheme. Twenty-four acute wards fulfilling the inclusion criteria will be recruited (16 wards at HUG, 4 wards at ORL and OSG each). Acute wards will be paired according to centre, specialty (eg, medicine, surgery, geriatrics) and baseline antibiotic use in days of therapy/admission. Wards will be randomised 1:1 to the intervention or control arm within each pair using an online random sequence generator. EOC, Ente Ospedaliero Cantonale; HUG, Geneva University Hospitals; ORL, Regional Hospital of Lugano; OSG, Regional Hospital of Bellinzona.
